title: Badlands National Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Current Conditions          Alerts    Caution        Helicopter Spraying for Canada Thistle for the Next Few Days  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Helicopter Spraying for Canada Thistle for the Next Few Days  A helicopter will be treating Canada Thistle in the Pinnacles, Conata Basin and Sage Creek areas for the next few days.
